name: S-adenosyl-L-methionine:tRNA 5-methylaminomethyl-2-thiouridine methyltransferase; S-adenosyl-L-methionine:tRNA (5-methylaminomethyl-2-thiouridylate)-methyltransferase
definition: S-Adenosyl-L-methionine + tRNA containing 5-aminomethyl-2-thiouridine <=> S-Adenosyl-L-homocysteine + tRNA containing 5-methylaminomethyl-2-thiouridylate
